getUserId

public java.lang.String getUserId()
Returns authenticating userid 注意：此userId不一定等同与饭否用户的user_id参数 它可能是任意一种当前用户所使用的ID类型（如邮箱，用户名等），

getHomeTimeline

public java.util.List<Status> getHomeTimeline()
                                       throws HttpException
Returns the 20 most recent statuses, including retweets, posted by the authenticating user and that user's friends. This is the equivalent of /timeline/home on the Web.
This method calls http://api.fanfou.com/statuses/home_timeline.format

返回：
list of the home Timeline
抛出：
HttpException
从以下版本开始：
fanfoudroid 0.5.0

getFriendsTimeline

public java.util.List<Status> getFriendsTimeline()
                                          throws HttpException
Returns the 20 most recent statuses posted in the last 24 hours from the authenticating1 user and that user's friends. It's also possible to request another user's friends_timeline via the id parameter below.
This method calls http://api.fanfou.com/statuses/friends_timeline.format

list of the Friends Timeline

showStatus

public Status showStatus(java.lang.String id)
                  throws HttpException
Returns a single status, specified by the id parameter. The status's author will be returned inline.

a single status

updateStatus

public Status updateStatus(java.lang.String status,
                           java.lang.String inReplyToStatusId)
                    throws HttpException
Updates the user's status. 如果要使用inreplyToStatusId参数, 那么该status就必须得是@别人的. The text will be trimed if the length of the text is exceeding 160 characters.
发布消息 http://api.fanfou.com/statuses/update.[json|xml]

参数：
status - the text of your status update
inReplyToStatusId - The ID of an existing status that the status to be posted is in reply to. This implicitly sets the in_reply_to_user_id attribute of the resulting status to the user ID of the message being replied to. Invalid/missing status IDs will be ignored.
返回：
the latest status
抛出：
HttpException - when Weibo service or network is unavailable
从以下版本开始：
fanfoudroid 0.5.0

verifyCredentials

public User verifyCredentials()
                       throws HttpException
Returns an HTTP 200 OK response code and a representation of the requesting user if authentication was successful; returns a 401 status code and an error message if not. Use this method to test if supplied user credentials are valid. 注意： 如果使用 错误的用户名/密码 多次登录后，饭否会锁IP 返回提示为“尝试次数过多，请去 http://fandou.com 登录“,且需输入验证码 登录成功返回 200 code 登录失败返回 401 code 使用HttpException的getStatusCode取得code

返回：
user
抛出：
HttpException - when Weibo service or network is unavailable
从以下版本开始：
androidroid 0.5.0
另请参见：

createSavedSearch

public SavedSearch createSavedSearch(java.lang.String query)
                              throws HttpException
Retrieve the data for a saved search owned by the authenticating user specified by the given id.

返回：
the data for a created saved search
抛出：
HttpException - when Weibo service or network is unavailable
从以下版本开始：
fanfoudroid 0.5.0

destroySavedSearch

public SavedSearch destroySavedSearch(int id)
                               throws HttpException
Destroys a saved search for the authenticated user. The search specified by id must be owned by the authenticating user.

参数：
id - The id of the saved search to be deleted.
返回：
the data for a destroyed saved search
抛出：
HttpException - when Weibo service or network is unavailable
从以下版本开始：
fanfoudroid 0.5.0

test

public boolean test()
             throws HttpException
Returns the string "ok" in the requested format with a 200 OK HTTP status code.

返回：
true if the API is working
抛出：
HttpException - when Weibo service or network is unavailable
从以下版本开始：
fanfoudroid 0.5.0
